attributes.action: Review the minimum size of retail car parking bays.
attributes.additional_details: There are also people with health and mobility problems who do not qualify for a blue disabled badge that must find this task near impossible if not painful. There simply is not sufficient room to enter or exit a vehicle safely. Its is also not always possible for parents to park in parent and child car parking bays, It is near impossible to remove a child car seat with baby seated in most standard retail car parking bays safely.
attributes.background: Most retail car parking bays are now not big enough for an everyday family sized vehicle. Its is a struggle even for an able bodied person to enter and exit a car safely without bumping the car in the next car parking bay.

rejection.details:
The size of car parking bays in private car parks is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to set a legal minimum size for all car parking spaces.
